text: Lucas Araújo de Oliveira (born 21 May 1999) is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for the club Grêmio. ==Professional career== Araújo joined the youth academy of Grêmio in 2012. Araújo made his professional debut with Grêmio in a 1-0 Campeonato Gaúcho win over Pelotas on 8 March 2020. ==References== ==External links== * * Grêmio Profile Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Fortaleza Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Grêmio Foot-Ball Porto Alegrense players
title: Lucas Araújo
